channel.title: Homes on William Trouleau
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on William Trouleau

item.description: Hi! I’m William. I’m a Ph.D. student at EPFL in the INDY Lab, under the supervision of Matthias Grossglauser and Patrick Thiran. My research ranges from machine learning algorithms to probabilistic modeling. In particular, I am interested in the statistical and algorithmic aspects of modeling, inference and control of epidemic processes diffusing over networks ; with applications on disease modeling, neuroscience, finance, and social network analysis. Here is a link to my Curriculum Vit√¶.

item.title: Honors & Awards
item.description: Winner of the KIT Tuberculosis Hackathon as part of the IDM team (2019) Teaching Assistant Award, EPFL (2019) ACM SIGKDD Student Travel Award (2016) EDIC Fellowship, EPFL (2015)
